panels.visual: Prismor attempting to forge javelin Sparks flying wrong directions Gear-like magical manifestations resisting **Sound EFFECTS:** "CLANG CLANG"
panels.dialogue: Prismor: "It's fighting me... like the tree fought Lunara!"

panels.visual: Pocky trying to enchant the javelin Celestial symbols swirling Both essences clashing
panels.dialogue: Pocky: "The essences are... tangled. This shouldn't be possible!"

panels.visual: Finished javelin - crude, unstable Glowing dangerously Party gathering around
panels.dialogue: Pocky: "I managed to stabilize it, but... something's very wrong with Everpeak's magic." Val: "The courier runes have been tampered with too. This isn't coincidence."

panels.visual: Sled race course visible down mountain Contestants gathering
panels.dialogue: Halfling courier: "Val! Val! The race is crazy today! The runes aren't working right!"
